backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report listing implemented frontend features, their related files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of frontend source files describing routing, pages, layouts, effects, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry defining extensive OKLCH-based design tokens, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app with metadata and script reference to the main bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application configuring TanStack Router with four client-side routes (Page1–Page4) and a root outlet.
frontend/src/components/effects/Celebrat: Full-screen celebratory overlay rendering animated heart and confetti emoji particles with a central celebration icon.
frontend/src/components/effects/KissOver: Full-screen kiss animation overlay with floating kiss emojis and a centered kiss icon image.
frontend/src/components/layout/RomanticL: Shared layout component providing romantic themed background, floating heart decorations, gradient overlay, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a DFINITY backend actor using React Query, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file indicating no backend queries are required for this frontend-only app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/components/utilities and a custom romantic theme using CSS variables with light and dark modes, plus utility classes and base styling for fonts, colors, and backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that creates the React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the main App with global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Page1.tsx: First interactive landing page showing a birthday/proposal message with Yes/No buttons, progressive No text changes, celebration effect on Yes, and navigation to Page 2.
frontend/src/pages/Page2.tsx: Second page asking a playful question with two affirmative options that trigger a kiss animation and then navigate to Page 3.
frontend/src/pages/Page3.tsx: Birthday wishes page displaying a heartfelt message with animations and automatically navigating to Page 4 after a delay.
frontend/src/pages/Page4.tsx: Final emotional page asking for affirmation and displaying romantic messages and animations without further navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, content scanning, and extensive theme extensions mapping CSS variables to a romantic color palette, fonts, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s purpose, schema version, and a list of implemented features outlining the four-page romantic birthday/proposal flow.
